Content:: Juan Roca Brunet (October 27, 1950 – July 10, 2022) was a basketball player from Cuba, who won the bronze medal with the men's national team at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany.[1]  This article about a Cuban Olympic medalist is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This biographical article relating to a Cuban basketball figure is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
